Dominion [startdom]: 3

The Annunaki is a giant of divine heritage. He was once the Guide of the Moon and the principle behind astrology, and as such, one of the most important servants of the Pantokrator. With the Pantokrator gone, he has foreseen that he will become the lord of this world.
